capabilityDescription.en: Splits, or partitions, record-oriented data based on the configured fields in the data. One or more properties must be added. The name of the property is the name of an attribute to add. The value of the property is a RecordPath to evaluate against each Record. Two records will go to the same outbound FlowFile only if they have the same value for each of the given RecordPaths. Because we know that all records in a given output FlowFile have the same value for the fields that are specified by the RecordPath, an attribute is added for each field. See Additional Details on the Usage page for more information and examples.
capabilityDescription.zh: Splits, or partitions, record-oriented data based on the configured fields in the data. One or more properties must be added. The name of the property is the name of an attribute to add. The value of the property is a RecordPath to evaluate against each Record. Two records will go to the same outbound FlowFile only if they have the same value for each of the given RecordPaths. Because we know that all records in a given output FlowFile have the same value for the fields that are specified by the RecordPath, an attribute is added for each field. See Additional Details on the Usage page for more information and examples.

en.description: Each dynamic property represents a RecordPath that will be evaluated against each record in an incoming FlowFile. When the value of the RecordPath is determined for a Record, an attribute is added to the outgoing FlowFile. The name of the attribute is the same as the name of this property. The value of the attribute is the same as the value of the field in the Record that the RecordPath points to. Note that no attribute will be added if the value returned for the RecordPath is null or is not a scalar value (i.e., the value is an Array, Map, or Record).
en.value: A RecordPath that points to a field in the Record.

zh.description: 每个动态属性表示一个RecordPath，将针对传入FlowFile中的每个记录进行评估。当为记录确定RecordPath的值时，将向传出的FlowFile添加一个属性。属性的名称与此属性的名称相同。属性的值与RecordPath指向的记录中字段的值相同。请注意，如果为RecordPath返回的值为空或不是标量值（即，该值是数组、映射或记录），则不会添加属性。

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for writing out the records

zh.description: 指定用于写入记录的控制器服务

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for reading incoming data

zh.description: 指定用于读取传入数据的控制器服务

original.en: Once all records in an incoming FlowFile have been partitioned, the original FlowFile is routed to this relationship.
original.zh: 一旦传入FlowFile中的所有记录都已分区，原始FlowFile将路由到此关系。

success.en: FlowFiles that are successfully partitioned will be routed to this relationship
success.zh: 成功分区的FlowFiles将路由到此关系

failure.en: If a FlowFile cannot be partitioned from the configured input format to the configured output format, the unchanged FlowFile will be routed to this relationship
failure.zh: 如果无法将FlowFile从配置的输入格式分区为配置的输出格式，则未更改的FlowFile将路由到此关系

segment.original.filename.en: The filename of the parent FlowFile

record.count.en: The number of records in an outgoing FlowFile

fragment.identifier.en: All partitioned FlowFiles produced from the same parent FlowFile will have the same randomly generated UUID added for this attribute
fragment.identifier.zh: 从同一父FlowFile生成的所有分区FlowFiles都将为此属性添加相同的随机生成UUID

fragment.index.en: A one-up number that indicates the ordering of the partitioned FlowFiles that were created from a single parent FlowFile
fragment.index.zh: 一个向上的数字，表示从单个父FlowFile创建的分区FlowFile的顺序

mime.type.en: The MIME Type that the configured Record Writer indicates is appropriate
mime.type.zh: 配置的记录编写器指示的MIME类型是适当的

fragment.count.en: The number of partitioned FlowFiles generated from the parent FlowFile
fragment.count.zh: 从父FlowFile生成的分区FlowFiles的数量

<dynamic property name>.en: For each dynamic property that is added, an attribute may be added to the FlowFile. See the description for Dynamic Properties for more information.
<dynamic property name>.zh: 对于添加的每个动态属性，可以向FlowFile添加一个属性。有关详细信息，请参见动态特性的说明。
